body_html:
Note that the referenced sources are in master branch, where the behaviour has much changed. In TensorFlow 1.0.1, a window average is used https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.0/tensorflow/tensorboard/components/vz_line_chart/vz-line-chart.ts#L432 , causing the artifacts on the images.

However, an exponential moving average has been merged 4 days ago in pull request #8363, resulting in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorboard/components/vz_line_chart/vz-line-chart.ts#L455.
body_text:
Note that the referenced sources are in master branch, where the behaviour has much changed. In TensorFlow 1.0.1, a window average is used https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.0/tensorflow/tensorboard/components/vz_line_chart/vz-line-chart.ts#L432 , causing the artifacts on the images.
However, an exponential moving average has been merged 4 days ago in pull request #8363, resulting in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorboard/components/vz_line_chart/vz-line-chart.ts#L455.
body:
Note that the referenced sources are in master branch, where the behaviour has much changed. In TensorFlow 1.0.1, a window average is used https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.0/tensorflow/tensorboard/components/vz_line_chart/vz-line-chart.ts#L432 , causing the artifacts on the images.

However, an exponential moving average has been merged 4 days ago in pull request #8363, resulting in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorboard/components/vz_line_chart/vz-line-chart.ts#L455.
